trans-unit.source: Represents an import that is required by a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object and that can specify both a contract name and metadata.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 物件需要的匯入，這個匯入可以指定合約名稱和中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> object required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 匯入定義要求之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type identity of the export type expected.
trans-unit.target: 預期之匯出型別的型別識別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> method to generate a type identity for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> 方法以產生特定型別的型別識別。

trans-unit.source: If no specific type is required, use <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要特定型別，請使用 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the metadata names and types required by the import definition; or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata" /> property to an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 機碼/值組的集合，其中包含匯入定義所需的中繼資料名稱和型別；若為 <see langword="null" />，則將 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata" /> 屬性設為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示匯入定義所需之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的基數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定可以在 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 的存留期多次滿足的匯入定義，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the import definition is required to be satisfied before a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定必須先滿足匯入定義，<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 才能開始產生匯出物件，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates that the importer requires a specific creation policy for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 值，這個值表示對於用來滿足這個匯入的匯出結果，匯入工具需要特定建立原則。

trans-unit.source: If no specific creation policy is needed, the default is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要特定建立原則，則預設為 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> class with the specified contract name, required type identity, required metadata, cardinality, and creation policy, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、必要型別識別、必要中繼資料、基數和建立原則，以及指出匯入定義是可重新撰寫的還是必要條件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="requiredMetadata" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requiredMetadata" /> 包含是 <see langword="null" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="cardinality" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cardinality" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> object required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 匯入定義要求之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type identity of the export type expected.
trans-unit.target: 預期之匯出型別的型別識別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> method to generate a type identity for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> 方法以產生特定型別的型別識別。

trans-unit.source: If no specific type is required, use <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要特定型別，請使用 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the metadata names and types required by the import definition; or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata" /> property to an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 機碼/值組的集合，其中包含匯入定義所需的中繼資料名稱和型別；若為 <see langword="null" />，則將 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata" /> 屬性設為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示匯入定義所需之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的基數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定可以在 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 的存留期多次滿足的匯入定義，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the import definition is required to be satisfied before a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定必須先滿足匯入定義，<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 才能開始產生匯出物件，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates that the importer requires a specific creation policy for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 值，這個值表示對於用來滿足這個匯入的匯出結果，匯入工具需要特定建立原則。

trans-unit.source: If no specific creation policy is needed, the default is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要特定建立原則，則預設為 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with this import.
trans-unit.target: 與這個匯入相關聯的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> class with the specified contract name, required type identity, required and optional metadata, cardinality, and creation policy, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、必要型別識別、必要和選擇性中繼資料、基數和建立原則，以及指出匯入定義是可重新撰寫的還是必要條件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="requiredMetadata" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requiredMetadata" /> 包含是 <see langword="null" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="cardinality" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cardinality" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an expression that defines conditions that must be matched to satisfy the import described by this import definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得運算式，這個運算式定義必須滿足才能符合此匯入定義所描述之匯入的條件。

trans-unit.source: An expression that contains a <see cref="T:System.Func`2" /> object that defines the conditions that must be matched for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> to be satisfied by an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Func`2" /> 物件的運算式，這個物件定義必須符合的條件，讓 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> 可以滿足 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" />。

trans-unit.source: The export definition to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的匯出定義。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the constraint represented by this object is satisfied by the export represented by the given export definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定之匯出定義所表示的匯出是否滿足此物件所表示的限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the constraint is satisfied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果滿足限制則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the importer requires a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示對於用來滿足這個匯入的匯出結果，匯入工具需要特定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 下列其中一個值：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />, if the importer does not require a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匯入工具不需要特定的 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" /> 則為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" /> to require that all exports used should be shared by all importers in the container.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />，要求所有使用的匯出都應該讓容器中的所有匯入工具共用。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" /> to require that all exports used should be non-shared in the container.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />，要求所有使用的匯出都不應在容器中共用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each importer receives a separate instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，每個匯入工具都會收到個別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata names of the export required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得匯入定義所需之匯出的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.String" /> objects that contain the metadata names of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects required by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件的集合，這些物件包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 所需之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 物件的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null` or return an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection that contains an element that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個屬性永遠不應該傳回`null`或傳回<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合，其中包含的項目是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the definition does not contain required metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義不包含必要的中繼資料，傳回空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合改為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expected type of the export that matches this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合此 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 之匯出的預期型別。

trans-unit.source: A string that is generated by calling the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> method on the type that this import expects.
trans-unit.target: 在此匯入預期的型別上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity(System.Type)" /> 方法後產生的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the value is <see langword="null" />, this import does not expect a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 <see langword="null" />，則表示此匯入不會預期特定型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition" /> 物件的字串表示。
